緊い: (かたい) - (esp. 固い & 堅い for wood, 硬い for metal and stone) hard/solid/tough; stiff/tight/wooden/unpolished (e.g. writing); strong/firm (not viscous or easily moved); safe/steady/honest/steadfast; obstinate/stubborn; (ant: 砕けた) bookish/formal/stuffy
